column4: hey how do i set up ubuntu to play movie clips from the internet like movies from ebaumsworld
what do i use to play video off the net like movies form ebaumsworld.com
I use the mplayer plugin with firefox.
With the codecs mentioned.
how do i install that and where
For the codecs, use the link in your message from ubotu.  You can get mplayer and its plugin with 'sudo apt-get install mplayer-386 mozilla-mplayer'.
Have you seen http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/6047 yet?  (From !sources)
ok yeah thats what i have
I can give you mine too if you'd like.
can u help me get my w32 codecs going ?
ok
u have aim or msn?
Yeah, both.  pm me if you'd prefer that to get through your codecs.
how do i pm with xchat?
Actually, who am I kidding?  That would be silly.  tonyyarusso on AIM.
For reference though, /msg nick Your message here.
(And you have to be registered to do it in this channel.)
dist-upgrade
should i update my hoary first though?
or should i just upgrade to breezy then update
I think I'd suggest upgrade the hoary and then go to breezy, but I'm not sure if it matters.
No harm in that way anyway.
true it sudo apt-get update to update hoary right?
update updates the sources list / package cache.  upgrade gets new versions of files.  dist-upgrade will get you to breezy from hoary.
Yeah, you can get it to replace pretty much anything you want in any ascii file.
I did, but I'm still at 90 FPS.
hey man
ive been looking for you haha
So what's your issue with it?
hey man
you helped me a while back set up meadi for the net
and i was wondering if you could help me do it again
Refresh my memory, meadi?
media
like sewting up to play vidoes of the net
Ah okay.  mplayer plugins and the like?
ok
Which version of Firefox?
the version that came with breezy
and you had me installed something else besides mplayer and it worked alot better
when i use mplayer the videos never finish they just stop after a while and the audio almost never kicks in
As in an alternative, or addon?
i installed all the codecs i needed already
i dont know
As far as I know I've always recommended mplayer, as that's what I use.
well i installed m player but its not the same thing that u had me install
There is the mozilla-mplayer plugin package though, perhaps that?
maybe u had me get a newer vserion
Maybe also gstreamer0.8*
yeah i have all those gstreamer codecs
if you could just step me thourgh it like u did last time
but i already have the codecs
I'm at a little bit of a loss as to what else it might have been.  There's a VLC plugin for Firefox too, but I haven't used it.
i think it mightve been gstearmer
Okay, sudo apt-get install mplayer-386 mozilla-mplayer gstreamer0.8*
Hope that it links automatically.
If not, sudo ln -s /usr/lib/mozilla/plugins/* /usr/lib/mozilla-firefox/plugins/
i did that first command u gave me and it installsed sucessfully
now do i do that second one u gave me?
If things are working already, then it's not necessary.  If you have problems still, try it.
ok it finished dling how do i get firefox to use the new stuff?;
ok i got the stuff now how do i get firefox to play media with it?
It should already.  Have you tried?  Otherwise do the symlink.  That's all I've got.
can u type thaty out again?
ok hey how do  i install the gstreamer plugin for firefox?
sudo apt-get install gstreamer0.8* mozilla-mplayer
ok once i install it how do i get firefox to use it?
after i did that it still tries to play it with totem
Either it will automatically, or you'll have to make the symlinks as before.
Ah, that part.
Remove the totem symlinks too.
In /usr/lib/mozilla-firefox/plugins/, rm the two with 'totem' in their name.
ok one sec
ok so i just delete the files
Yeah.
which files do i remove exactly the .las or the .so or what?
The two with totem in their name, whatever those are.
theres 4
Okay, then all four.
whats the command to delete?
rm
sudo rm
correct.
ok now what?
Now try it.
man the video and sound quality is great works perfectly thanks alot man
np
hmm that works good except for the video size is like half the size it should be
is there a nother plugin i can try?
How are you judging what "it should be"?
mmm how i see it when using windows
Not really sure.  I don't have anything else to recommend since that works for me.
hmm u set me up with one where it had like a black loading screen
you helped me set it up on aim
Oy, I don't really remember.
hmm ok
whats the difference between gstreamer-0.8* mozilla-mplayer and just mozilla-mplayer?
